jobDescription: Role: Data analyst / Data scientistLocation: Milpitas, CA, USAType : Full time positionMandatory Solid understanding of UX design and qualitative research Minimum Qualification - Has 4+ years of experience working with quantitative methods, ideally integrated with qualitative methods  Has designed and executed multiple quantitative research studies across industries  Advanced statistical analysis (clustering, regression, conjoint)  Web analytics and analysis  Survey design and analysis  Experience in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics (such as Python, R, Matlab, C++, Java or Go), and with SQL.  We are looking for someone closer to a data analyst / data scientist, but with solid understanding of UX design and qualitative research. Also they will need to show us some evidence of their work and reflect well on their role in a design team  .
